integromat_bucket_linked: A user linked an Integromat bucket to a project
integromat_bucket_unlinked: A user unselected an Integromat bucket in a project
integromat_file_added: A user added a file to an Integromat bucket in a project
integromat_file_removed: A user removed a file in an Integromat bucket in a project
integromat_file_updated: A user updated a file in an Integromat bucket in a project
integromat_folder_created: A user created a folder in an Integromat in a project
integromat_node_authorized: A user authorized the Integromat addon for a project
integromat_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Integromat addon for a project
integromat_node_deauthorized_no_user: Integromat addon for a project deauthorized
